definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

sentences.english: Words are made up of many syllables or sounds that arise and pass away consecutively.
sentences.chinese: 語言文字由很多相續生滅的音節或聲音構成。

sentences.english: Of the five monks who were close in the past, only I have managed to escape Birth and Death .
sentences.chinese: 五名僧侶誰接近過去，只有我已經設法逃脫生滅。

sentences.english: Winemakers come and go, and we have to update our database.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄酒廠生生滅滅，因此我們必須更新我們的數據庫。

sentences.english: We also give the probability distribution formula of hitting time about birth-death processes.
sentences.chinese: 同時給出了關於生滅過程的擊中時的概率分佈公式。

sentences.english: From macroscopic layer, economic system is regarded as a class of growth process.
sentences.chinese: 從宏觀層次上把生產和消費作爲一類生滅過程來研究。

definition: actual situation/the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
chance/opportunity/predestined relationship/(Buddhist) principal and secondary causes/chain of cause and effect
to reincarnate/reincarnation (Buddhism)/(of the seasons etc) to follow each other cyclically/cycle/CL:個|个[ge4]
variable/changeable/fickle/impermanence (Sanskrit: anitya)/ghost taking away the soul after death/to pass away/to die
to ebb and rise/to decrease and then grow
rotating disk/wheel/rotor/cycle of reincarnation in Buddhism
to convert to (a religion)/to rely upon/refuge/mainstay
